title: How do I redeem the Gift Card? : BookMyShow Support Centre
category: BookMyShow Gift Card : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
Making a payment through a gift card is as easy as 1-2-3!
On the 'Secure Payment' page, please select the option 'Gift Voucher' then enter your GV code under the 'Enter your Gift Voucher' slot and click on 'Apply'
Please make the partial payment of the tickets with the preferred payment mode.
